name: Shafurai
description:
Dash through the air in search of fruit to fill up your big bowl! keep an eye out for yokai! (Download recommended for a smoother experience)

Controls: Mouse to point and left click to dash

Soundtrack by the friendly https://soundcloud.com/paddysmitth
Game made in 3 days for the MiniJam# 29 With the theme of "Ninja" and limitation of "No Combat".
